mapper.insert: INSERT INTO interview_document (session_id, document_type, document_id, created_at) VALUES (#{sessionId}, #{documentType}, #{documentId}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT interview_doc_id AS interviewDocId, session_id AS sessionId, document_type AS documentType, document_id AS documentId, created_at AS createdAt FROM interview_document WHERE session_id = #{sessionId}
